centralized_nlp_package.utils.config.get_config()[source]¶
Return type:

DictConfig

centralized_nlp_package.utils.logging_setup.setup_logging(log_file_path='logs/log_file.log', env='dev')[source]¶

Set up the Loguru logger with console and file handlers.

Parameters:

  • log_file_path (str) – Path to the log file. Defaults to “logs/log_file.log”.

  • log_level (str) – Logging level. Defaults to “INFO”.
